The wife of Gurugram judge Krishna Kant Sharma bled to death after she was
shot in the chest by her husband's personal security officer (PSO). Ritu,
38 and their 18-year-old son Dhruv were both shot at by the PSO near
Arcadia Market in Sector 49 on Saturday afternoon.
They were rushed to the hospital where doctors said that the woman had
lost a lot of blood due to the bullet injury and that is what led to her
death. She will be cremated tomorrow in Hisar district of Haryana.

The PSO, Mahipal Singh, who had been posted with the Chief Judicial
Magistrate for the last two years, has been sent to police custody for
